Articles.Content:
Hi all! I’ve set up a new KSP install (fresh, copied straight from Steam) on v1.8.1. I added an exceedingly large pile of mods since I just built myself a new computer, and after getting USI to play nice, I figured everything else would be fine, since I installed everything with CKAN except USI Exploration to stop it from hanging at loading the sciences. I fixed it by installing the mod manually. Anyway, at the KSC, everything was totally black. Like, pitch dark, absolutely nothing. The buildings were still interactive, but the tracking station seemed to have disappeared. Zooming in or out does nothing. Help!

KSP.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xSuaZmO7zZwi-L6KVJYeTCymGykYwpat/view?usp=drivesdk

Modlist: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h4aWly5qWr-cpk_4YVLOKBGfZiXPi80V/view?usp=drivesdk

Thanks in advance, please tell me if the links are working or if I need to provide more information. I may not be able to provide it though, as I am currently away from my computer and expect to be until Thursday morning. I’m typing this on my phone only because I just remembered the issue and figured it’d be better to type this before I forget and do it earlier. Thanks!!
